RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 7F Turf CR: 88. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 25 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run SIX FURLONGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MANDY GREEN slow early trailed to the far turn circling out to upper stretch firing in the seven path angling in surging up four deep in the final yards. UNWHIRLED was bumped steadying at the break, responded in upper stretch surging splitting horses late bidding gamely from the rail in the final yards. SUPER DONNA G stalked close up through the far turn vying in upper stretch dueling late between horses in the three path. POLITICAL ASTRAY raced five wide to the half pressing in bid on the far turn extending late between horses. MOONSHINE DREAMER shuffled back on the far turn swung seven wide in upper stretch finishing well. DEL MAR FLASH pressed early then backed off angling five wide in upper stretch needing more late. LILLY CHROME slow early lagged to lane moving up some late. IN TO THE NIGHT raced evenly to the far turn then weakened in upper stretch. SUMMER STORM set a pressured pace dueling into upper stretch wearing out along the inside there. ALITTLESLICEOF PIE was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Moonshine Dreamer
ENTRY.COMMENT: shuffled back far turn, 7 wide lane

ENTRY.NAME: Unwhirled
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumpbed steadied break, rallied lane, split foes, gamely rail

ENTRY.NAME: Del Mar Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, backed off, 5 wide lane, lacked punch

ENTRY.NAME: Alittlesliceof Pie
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Summer Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: set a pressured pac,e dueled into lane, gave way inside

ENTRY.NAME: Super Donna G
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, pressed upper stretch, right there late between

ENTRY.NAME: Mandy Green
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, trailed far turn, circled out lane, surged up 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Lilly Chrome
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Political Astray
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5 wide to 1/2, pressed far turn, dueled between lane

ENTRY.NAME: In to the Night
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JULY 25, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIRST HOMESTEAD stalked the pace through the backside wresting the lead on the far turn widening in the four path upper stretch angling in while holding firm to wire. PARADE GRAND advanced on the backside emerging off a loose leader from mid track in upper stretch making no headway there angling in a clear second best. DYNAFORM hustled up along the inside to the half saved ground to upper stretch mustering enough there to hold the others. CLOSE THE CASE set the pace ceding on the far turn fading through the lane. CAPTAIN RILEY was always outrun. SAINT SCOTTY gave early retreat.

ENTRY.NAME: Dynaform
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled up inside to half, saved ground to lane, held others

ENTRY.NAME: First Homestead
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, wrested lead far turn, widened four path, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Close the Case
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, ceded far turn, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Saint Scotty
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave early retreat

ENTRY.NAME: Captain Riley
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Parade Grand
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, chased to lane, no head way mid track, angled in

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 56. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LAKE HAMILTON pressed the pace through the turn drawing even abreast rival in upper stretch edging away to win clear. GONNA WIN IT a step slow through the turn gave steady surge in the four path down the lane saving place on the wire. ROGERS GINGER set a pressured pace through the turn dueling inside of rival upper stretch ceding while weakening late. COMMANDER CODY gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Rogers Ginger
ENTRY.COMMENT: set a pressured pace, dueled inside of foe lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Lake Hamilton
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, drew even abreast lane, cleared

ENTRY.NAME: Commander Cody
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Gonna Win It
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, angled 4 wide, steady surge, up for place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 5F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 25 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CRACK THE MOON stalked the pace through the turn wresting the lead in the four path upper stretch shaking clear mid stretch holding safe to wire. ROLL DEM BONES unresponsive to early prompting angled out on the turn coming five wide in upper stretch finishing well though too late. SANTIAGO'S CAT stalked the pace racing between horses at the head of the lane weakening the final eighth. OSBIN set the pace through the turn then faded down the lane. ALLABOUTBIZ gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Allaboutbiz
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Osbin
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, passed top lane, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Roll Dem Bones
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow under early prompting, angled out turn, bid 5 wide lane

ENTRY.NAME: Santiago's Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, between top lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Crack the Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, led upper stretch, drew clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 62. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AMERICAN DREAMER pressed early then backed off on the turn circling out in upper stretch surging late six wide getting up on the wire. LEAPIN LEVA stalked the pace chasing into upper stretch surging late at mid track missing on the wire. DERBY WIFE a step slow through the turn gave a mild rally down the lane besting the others. DEVINE BY DESIGN slow early lagged to upper stretch proving no menace. KETO FRIENDLY broke sharply setting the pace into upper stretch faltering abruptly there under outside pressure. TEQUILA EMPIRE was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: American Dreamer
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, evenly turn, circled lane, 6 wide surge up on wire

ENTRY.NAME: Leapin Leva
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased to lane, surged mid track, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Derby Wife
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, mild rally to lane, outbid others

ENTRY.NAME: Devine by Design
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Tequila Empire
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Keto Friendly
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace, faltered mid stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 25 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DETAILED broke sharply to a clear lead drawing off in upper stretch winning as much the best. TORIANNE slow early saved ground to upper stretch rallying along the rail as second best. MY BATON ROUGE chased the pace being dispatched in upper stretch weakening late. CHICAGO CAT faded on the turn. MODELO RUBIA was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Torianne
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, saved ground, rallied on rail lane, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Detailed
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace, drew off top lane, much best

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Springland Farm & Lynden Branch & Dr.James P. Morehead

ENTRY.NAME: My Baton Rouge
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, dispatched lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Modelo Rubia
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Chicago Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 25 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: APPRAISAL pressed the pace dueling through the turn shaking clear in upper stretch digging in late barely holding on under outside pressure. LUCKY JUNIOR slow early surged on the turn rallying down the lane drawing even abreast rival late just missing. TIMMY pressed the pace dueling on the turn ceding in upper stretch weakening late. LOW COUNTRY DUDE gained on the turn then faded in upper stretch. CITY TRIPPER a step slow early was rushed wide on the turn giving way in upper stretch. SPIRIT OF WINDSOR pressed the pace through the turn then wilted in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Spirit of Windsor
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, wilted lane

ENTRY.NAME: City Tripper
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, wide move turn, spent lane

ENTRY.NAME: Appraisal
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled turn, shook clear lane, dug in, just held

ENTRY.NAME: Low Country Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: gained on the turn, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Junior
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, surged on the turn, drew even abreast late, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Timmy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled turn, ceded lane, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 25, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 25 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NOMO RON set the pace widening into upper stretch holding firm late in the four path. COLONEL MIKE chased the pace looming on the turn extending down the lane proving no match while saving place. SUDDENLY SEDUCTIVE slow early gained on the turn racing five wide down the lane finishing evenly. TAPPIN ROYALTY slow early rallied on the turn coming six wide down the lane finishing evenly. BULLION raced mid pack fading down the lane. COLOMBARD pressed early then gave way to upper stretch. OUT FOR JUSTICE flashed early speed then faded on the turn. GRAB THE MUNNY breaking slowly was well back throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Colombard
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Nomo Ron
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, widened top lane, held firm 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Out for Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed speed, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Grab the Munny
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Tappin Royalty
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, rallied on turn, 6 wide lane, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Colonel Mike
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, loomed on turn, extended lane, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Suddenly Seductive
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, gained on turn, 5 wide lane, even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Bullion
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, faded lane
